item.title: Singapore has seen the launch of four new BMW models
item.description: BMW Group Asia is launching four new car models simultaneously for the first time in Singapore. The First-Ever BMW i8 Roadster The BMW i8 Roadster features upward-opening doors. This groundbreaking convertible plug-in hybrid, dubbed a “gentleman’s racer,” can accelerate from 0 to 100 km/h in 4.6 seconds. CS Liew, a director at an agricultural science company, owns the first edition in Singapore, which is already on the road. Initially preferring hardtop convertibles, Liew was captivated by the i8 Roadster’s design.
